content: > you are very welcome to join our > growing facebook community share > project photos and connect with other > crocheters in a positive and > encouraging environment click here > 1 > an ad-free printer friendly pdf > version of this pattern is available > in my etsy shop click here to find > sweet bee crochet on etsy 2 these dish scrubbers are made using worsted weight cotton yarn and worsted weight scrubby yarn add them to your market table or pair them with some cute dishcloths for a house-warming gift of course you can make them for your own use in your favourite colours to match your kitchen **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 5 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn colour a regular not scrubby textured - approximately 5 yards of worsted weight scrubby yarn colour b - 4 5mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //www etsy com/ca/shop/sweetbeecrochetshop
